a:r.a:t: Each HyperIndex token represents a basket of components held across multiple networks (e.g., ETH, BSC, SOL).
Ownership is on-chain & proportional; the protocol never takes custody.

Institutional primary (creation/redemption) for L1/L2; retail secondary trades the issued index tokens with DEX level simplicity & CEX level speed-cost. Institutional-grade reliability & retail-level accessibility.
Asset-backed index tokens spanning 15+ chains with non-custodial vaults
Underlying assets are stored natively in on-chain vaults per chain; mint/burn moves components in/out of vaults programmatically, via Cross Chain Messenger of LayerZero.

This enables instant cross-chain diversified exposure within a single tradable token, eliminating the complexity of managing separate wallets, bridges, and exchanges.
Smart Contract Vaults (SCV) are on-chain vaults deployed natively on each blockchain. Assets are directly stored in these vaults, removing the need for centralized custody.
The mint/burn mechanism automatically moves assets in and out of SCVs, ensuring that index tokens always remain fully collateralized and verifiable on-chain.
